actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the treatment of outdoor advertising displays for purposes of the accelerated cost recovery system.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disqualify outdoor advertising displays for accelerated cost recovery system depreciation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the treatment of outdoor advertising displays for purposes of the accelerated cost recovery system.
